title: Farm work forging. No. 2. Forge welding
creator_credit: H Woodard and United States. Office of Education
brief_description: How to maintain a clean, deep, hot fire; how to heat mild steel for forging; how to upset and scarf round stock; how to make a lap weld; how to shape and hammer refine the weld.
